condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section I. A. 4 | Description :MRRD shall maintain an inter-ministerial committee throughout projectimplementation | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Section I. A.2 | Description :MRRD shall maintain a Program Management Office throughout project implementation.| Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Section I. A.3 and Section I. B. 4 | Description :MRRD through the PMO shall retain a qualified FinancialManagement Agent to assist MRD in compliance with all FM requirements in the FA | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Section I. A.9 | Description :The Recipient shall carry out the project in accordance with the OperationsManual, FM manual, the procurement manual, the ESMF, and the GAAP | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Section I. B. 2 | Description :The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association interim unauditedquarterly financial reports for the project | Frequency :Quarterly
